docs.lead_paragraph: New York spoke for the Nation yesterday when she welcomed the home-coming squadron under command of Admiral Sampson. There was neither lisping nor stammering in the speech. It was the full-mouthed, straight-spoken, honest, earnest and resonant speech of the masses. There was no diplomatic finish or juggle to it.

headline.main: NEW YORK GREETS VICTORIOUS NAVY; A Marvelous Demonstration by the People. SAMPSON'S SHIPS PARADE Seven Warships Steam Up the Hudson Amid Enthusiasm. CHEERS FOR SAILORS Tenement Residents Particularly in Evidence Among the Spectators -- New York, Iowa, Indiana, Brooklyn, Massachusetts, Oregon, and Texas in Line.
